snippet: The firm said it had resigned as the auditor of two companies, “after concluding today that the firm’s independence has been impacted as a result of this individual’s behavior.”
abstract: Audit firm KPMG fires unidentified senior partner in its Los Angeles office for insider trading incident.
lead_paragraph: The firm said it had resigned as the auditor of two companies, “after concluding today that the firm’s independence has been impacted as a result of this individual’s behavior.”

headline.seo: KPMG Fires a Senior Partner in an Insider Trading Episode
headline.main: KPMG Fires a Senior Partner in an Insider Trading Episode
headline.print_headline: KPMG Fires a Senior Partner In an Insider Trading Episode
